snippet: Health officials suspect that a contaminated drug is to blame for the outbreak that has killed two people and sickened a dozen others.
abstract: Health officials suspect that a contaminated steroid drug is to blame for the meningitis outbreak that has killed two people and sickened a dozen others in Tennessee and North Carolina; patients had received spinal injections for pain.
lead_paragraph: Health officials suspect that a contaminated drug is to blame for the outbreak that has killed two people and sickened a dozen others.

headline.seo: Meningitis Cases Are Linked to Steroid Injections
headline.main: Meningitis Cases Are Linked to Steroid Injections in Spine
headline.print_headline: Meningitis Cases Are Linked To Steroid Injections in Spine
